com.melanie.business.controllers

Class ProductEntryControllerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.melanie.business.controllers.ProductEntryControllerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProductEntryController

    public class ProductEntryControllerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProductEntryController
    Author:
    Akwasi Owusu This class is the main business controller for the Products subsystem. It provides methods for all operations regarding products and product categories
